title: Just a Minute Gaming [JAM.gg] Recruiting Established team for 2016

embed.description: Just a Minute Gaming (JAM) was founded in August 2015 by former online poker professional Chris 'Pulse' Bridle. JAM's vision statement is to be a major gaming content provider to a worldwide audience across a wide variety of popular games.

body:
Just a Minute Gaming (JAM) is recruiting:

**Established Oceanic League of Legends team to compete in the Oceanic Open Ladder 2016 Season.**

 

_**Requirements:**_

* All members 17+
* Available minimum 3 nights per week for prac
* Diamond+
* Applicants must be an established core of minimum 3 players. Individuals may be invited to apply at a later date.
* All members are required to sign a contract specifying the expectations of both parties throughout the agreed term. Details of the contract will be discussed if you progress further in the application process.
 

_**What JAM will provide for your team:**_

* Professional, reputable and legally binding environment for you to produce and monetise your personal brand with no investment. Specifically, JAM and its members will collectively assist in promotion, collaboration, production and sustained growth. The organisation may also assist you in achieving Twitch partnership, act as an agent in international player transfers and mentor you in brand recognition, promotion and monetisation.
* Jerseys for LAN events and possible financial support for travel.
* Sponsor benefits when available.
 

Email an application to recruitment@jam.gg

_**Your application should include:**_

* Player biography (including relevant gaming profile AND social media links)
* Player gaming history
* Accomplishments/achievements
* References (former team-mates, respected community members)
* Availability

_**Please answer the following questions in your application:**_

Why do you want to join JAM?

What are your goals for your gaming career?

 

Thanks for reading!

Regards,

Chris/Pulse
JAM Owner/Manager
